description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (n >= 1, 1 <= k< = n) gives number of non-distorting tie-avoiding integer vote weights.
references: Author?, Solution to Board of Directors Problem, J. Rec. Math., 9 (No. 3, 1977), 240.

mathematica: a[1, 1] = 1; a[n_, 1] := a[n, 1] = a[n - 1, Floor[(n + 1)/2]]; a[n_, k_ /; k > 1] := a[n, k] = a[n, 1] + a[n - 1, k - 1]; A037254 = Flatten[ Table[ a[n, k], {n, 1, 11}, {k, 1, n}]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 03 2012, after given recurrence *)
prog: (Haskell)a037254 n k = a037254_tabl !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a037254_row n = a037254_tabl !! (n-1)a037254_tabl = map fst $ iterate f ([1], drop 2 a002083_list) where   f (row, (x:xs)) = (map (+ x) (0 : row), xs)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 18 2012
